short_summary: Determining the Kilometric Rate for Mileage Reimbursements
full_summary:
# Kilometric Rate Determination for Mileage Reimbursements - Request for Proposal
### Solicitation Information

|  **Field**  |  **Description**  |
|  ---  |  ---  |
| Solicitation Number | 24062-22-299-001 |
| Publication Date | August 11, 2023  |
| Tender Closing Date | September 1, 2023 (2:00 PM)  |
| Contract Start Date | September 1, 2023  |
| Contract End Date | March 31, 2030  |

### Request Overview

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBCS) invites proposers to submit a proposal for the Kilometric Rate Determination for Mileage Reimbursements. This request is for a competitive process where multiple proposers will have the opportunity to participate. The contract expiry date is 2030-03-31.

### Procurement Information

*   UNSPSC Code: 81141603
*   UNSPSC Description: Transport finance or economics (English); Économie ou financement du transport (French)
*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

### Selection Criteria

The Least Cost per Point is the primary selection criteria.

### Regions

The opportunity is open to the National Capital Region (NCR) but delivery will take place in the same region.

### Contact Information

*   Dawn Dormer
*   Email: dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca
*   Phone: (343) 542-8102

### Attachments

The following documents are provided:
*   Questions and Answers Series 2 (English) 
*   Questions and Answers Series 1 (English)
*   Request for Proposal (English)
*   Questions and Answers Series 2 (French)
*   Questions and Answers Series 1 (French)
*   Request for Proposal (French) To access the documents, click here: HTTPS://CANADABuys.CANADA.CA...

Please follow the instructions provided to submit your RFP. 

Best regards,
